The film was both a critical and commercial success and managed to win a lot of hearts. And if you are someone who was left wanting for more, here is a good news. Zoya Akhtar has confirmed that the sequel to the film is being planned and executed.

While Nick took a few seconds to answer this one, he was prompt enough to answer it with a dash of humor. He said, 'Yes. It's when I looked at the bill!'

The wedding soon turned into a star-studded event and a Bollywood bash when all the A-listers from the industry turned up to bless the couple.
title: Zoya Akhtar Confirms Gully Boy Sequel, Review Of 'Made In Heaven' And More From Ent
description: Made In Heaven: Finally A Show That's Much More Than Just Crazy Rich Indians Getting Married! The show is supported by a strong ensemble cast that includes Shashank Arora and Shivani Raghuvanshi and other pivotal guest appearances that includes Deepti Naval, Shweta Tripathi, Vinay Pathak, Ayesha Raza, Rasika Duggal among others.
